job.description: strongSoftware RD Engineer of Test SystembrstrongullililibrbrlistrongAbout Our ClientbrbrstrongICbrbrstrongJob Descriptionbrbrstrongulli In response to internal customer requirementlili Interfaces with internal team and Manufacturing to ensure that the early pilot units meet all requirements and ship on timelili Investigates emerging production test technologies and develops concepts for future test productslili Develops complex specifications statements of work metrics schedules and budgetslili Technically manages key suppliers that are critical to project success This includes assisting in source selection participating in supplier design reviews etcbrbrliulstrongThe Successful Applicantbrbrstrongulli 5 years of experience as firmware or software engineerslili Experience capturing customers SW requirements into technical specifications and statements of work is a pluslili Good communication skill in EnglishbrbrliulstrongWhats On OfferbrbrstrongbrbrbrbrstrongContact Pierce JenbrstrongstrongQuote job ref 4207305strongul
